column4: i'm starting to get nervous.  this mobo boots but doesn't install.  can't figure it out.  tried all sorts of versions of ubuntu, sysrescd, puppy linux.  wonder if i goofed something up installing it
everyone says this mobo is supported well.  guess i'll start unplugging stuff one by one
not really. when exactly does it crash everytime?
it depends on which version i try to install.  which should i try?
yeah, well there is i386 and 64bit, livecd and alternate.
directly when loading the kernel? nothing else on screen? before that?
it was memory.  i'm a moron.  this board only supports 2 gig and i had 4 in.
good to know. what chipset (so I can avoid it in the future if the need arises)?
now the joy of trying to take a mobo back :)
seves you right that you bought via crap :P

i always buy the cheapest i can find.  actually, i usually get my stuff from dumpsters or curbside.  i just went to compusa to buy some ram for my wife's laptop and picked this up then.  that'll teach me
